songs.title: Love is a Game
songs.lyrics:
All your expectations of my love are impossible
Surely, you know
That I'm not easy to hold
It's so sad how incapable
Of learning to grow I am

songs.title: Heat Waves
songs.lyrics: Sometimes all I think about is you, late nights in the middle of June

songs.title: What was I Made For?
songs.lyrics:
I used to float, now I just fall down
I used to know but I'm not sure now
What I was made for
What was I made for?

songs.title: If You Leave Me Now
songs.lyrics:
When did we lose our way?
My whole world was unraveling
And girl, it's driving me insane
There's no road worth traveling

songs.title: Defying Gravity
songs.lyrics:
Unlimited
Together, we're unlimited
Together, we'll be the greatest team there's ever been

songs.title: This City
songs.lyrics:
This city's gonna break my heart
This city's gonna love me then leave me alone

songs.title: Die with A Smile
songs.lyrics:
I'd wanna hold you just for a while
And die with a smile
If the world was ending, I'd wanna be next to you

songs.title: Condensed Cetacean
songs.lyrics:
成为 它的辽阔 它的孤寂
放任我灵魂 睡在 何地
都能 借你栖息

songs.title: From the Start
songs.lyrics:
That when I talk to you, oh, Cupid walks right through
And shoots an arrow through my heart
And I sound like a loon, but don't you feel it too?
